extension.name: VideoWhisper Live Streams
extension.author: VideoWhisper.com
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2009 - 2010 Open Source Matters. All rights reserved.
extension.description: This module will show live streams broadcast by VideoWhisper Live Streaming with previews.

param.name: count
param.label: Count
param.description: The number of items to display (default is 10)

param.name: columns
param.label: Columns
param.description: The number of items to display per row (default is 1)

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
